name: Cut the Rope
description: A physics-based puzzle game where you cut ropes to feed candy to a cute monster named Om Nom.
A single-player sliding block puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile!

name: Space Waves
description: An arcade game where you control an arrow to avoid obstacles through 33 levels of varying difficulty.

name: Hide N Seek
description: A fun 3D simulation game where you play hide and seek with kids. Search the house to find them!

name: Bubble Pop Classic
description: Bubble Pop Classic is a fascinating bubble shooter game with a stage-based style, each with its challenge!

name: Crazy Motorcycle
description: An exciting motorcycle racing game with challenging tracks and stunts!

name: Moto X3M
description: A time trial bike racing game with 22 levels, wild stunts, and challenging obstacles.

name: Run 3
description: An addictive endless runner game set in space where you navigate through a series of challenging tunnels.

name: Slice Master
description: A fun and challenging fruit-slicing game where you swipe to slice various fruits while avoiding bombs.

name: Racing Limits
description: A high-speed racing game with multiple modes, realistic physics, and customizable cars.

name: Stunt Rider
description: An exciting game where you play as an experienced stuntman, performing daring stunts on your motorcycle in different levels.
